title: Head-to-head comparison data pipeline
description: Build SQL views and data export for player-vs-player comparison: career stats side-by-side, phase breakdown (PP/middle/death), vs bowling type matchups, venue performance, recent form (last 10 innings). Export as comparison_data.js for dashboard.

notes.note: Created generate_comparison_data.py. Uses existing DuckDB views only (no new SQL views). Follows generate_rankings.py code pattern.

Generator executed successfully. Output: comparison_data.js (282.8 KB, 12386 lines). 36 qualified batters (500+ balls), 62 qualified bowlers (300+ balls). All players have career, phase, matchup, form, and ranking data.

Data validated: JSON parses clean, all player sections populated. Spot-checked V Kohli (13 bowling types, 3 phases, rank #11) and JJ Bumrah (2 hand splits, 3 phases, rank #1). Ruff check and format passed.
